title: Geometry Format
description: Validates model geometry files for format compatibility and restricted features. Identifies geometry features that may not work on all platforms.

fields.title: Restricted Poly Mesh
fields.description: Error when geometry contains poly_mesh data. Poly meshes are a restricted feature that may not be available on all platforms.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the geometry identifier with poly_mesh

fields.title: JSON Parse Error
fields.description: Error when the geometry JSON file could not be parsed. Check for syntax errors in the geometry definition.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the JSON parse error message
